string.text: To talk to someone point sight at him and press СEТ button.
Find artifact in the place pointed on the map and bring it to the trader.
Search dead bodies, you may find some useful staff.
Hand a medikit to this dunce.

Press Contact (—). In and on minimap on the screen other stalkers with activated PDA will appear. Their attitude to you will also be stated on the screen. Be careful if you see enemies on the screen. However bandits and, heh, monsters usually donТt use PDA, so you better watch out in the Zone.
Watch out! YouТre nearby anomalies. Use bolts to define their borders.
Marked, watch out. Next time it may be you!
Hey, Marked, one stalker just returned from deep raid into Zone. He is wounded and can't move anymore. Help him, may be he know something about Gunslinger.
Hey, Marked. There is a badly wounded stalker not far from you, he was coming back after a trip deep inside the Zone. Help him, he may know something about the Gunslinger.
Hey, there is some kind of action near you. I send coordinates to you. Check, what are going there.
Well, Marked, itТs up to you. This way or another, youТve passed the examination, but deal with Wolf and his team on your own. Generally IТm waiting for you, got some job.
Well done, Marked. If it continues, youТll acquire many friends. Come into mine, weТll have a chat.
—талкер, ты на территории ƒолга. Ѕудешь бу€нить - получишь 4-ю степень инвалидности !
